name: Pocket Cornhole: Bean Bag Toss
description:
From the spin of the bag to the slide on the board, Pocket Cornhole is the best feeling cornhole app in the app store.

This game uses a power meter to determine distance and a flick to determine the direction the bag will travel.

Play the time attack mode to see how many points one can score in 30 seconds or battle with a very challenging computer opponent in the 1 player vs computer mode.
